title: Elden Ring: 10 BIGGEST Changes
description:
From Software's Elden Ring (PC, PS5, PS4, Xbox Series X/S/One) will be fairly different compared to their previous games. Here's why.
Subscribe for more: https://www.youtube.com/gameranxTV?sub_confirmation=1

#EldenRing

References:

https://eldenring.wiki.fextralife.com/Crafting

https://www.gamesradar.com/elden-ring-fast-travel-works-from-nearly-anywhere-on-the-map/

https://eldenring.wiki.fextralife.com/Ashes+of+War

title: 10 LONGEST Single Player Experiences of 2021
description:
Looking for a decent length singleplayer adventure? We've got you covered on PC, PS5, PS4, Xbox Series X/S/One, and Switch with these 2021 games.
Subscribe for more: https://www.youtube.com/gameranxTV?sub_confirmation=1

0:00 Intro 
0:37 Sherlock Holmes: Chapter One 
1:42 Far Cry 6 
2:39 Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous 
3:38 Shin Megami Tensei V 
4:37 Tales of Arise 
5:36 Monster Hunter Stories 2: Wings of Ruin + Monster Hunter Rise
6:36 NEO: The World Ends with You
7:22 Lost Judgment
8:26 Returnal
9:22 Loop Hero 
10:05 BONUS



Sherlock Holmes: Chapter One 

Platform : PC PS5 XSX|S November 16, 2021 

Release Date : PS4 Xbox One Q1 2022



Far Cry 6 

Platform : PC PS5 XSX|S PS4 Xbox One Stadia 

Release Date : October 7, 2021 



Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous 

Platform : PC macOS September 2, 2021  

Release Date : PS4 Xbox One March 1, 2022

Platform : Switch 

Release Date : November 12, 2021

Platform : PC PS5 XSX|S PS4 Xbox One   

Release Date : September 10, 2021 



Monster Hunter Stories 2: Wings of Ruin + Monster Hunter Rise

Lost Judgment
